page.title: 08M and S Cattle Transport
page.content: M+S{Transport}was established in 1976 and is based near St.Dominick.There is also an office in nearby Callington. The proprietor is Mr.G.Martin. He has nine{cattle}lorries and two plant hire excavators. His business serves the farmers of East Cornwall and West Devon. The firm also attends{markets}at Truro, Wadebridge, St.Austell, Liskeard, Tavistock, Kingsbridge, Newton Abbot, Plympton, Exeter, Holsworthy, Hallworthy, Week St.Mary, Fives Lanes and Launceston. Many journeys are made to{slaughter {houses}in St.Austell, Tavistock, Plymouth, Launceson, Tenbury, Totnes, Exeter, Torrington, Copplestone, Willand, Treburley and Wimbourne. The larger lorries carry up to 28 steers at a time but usually he averages 28 steers per lorry.
